originalText.text: Relentlessly rude and snappy, yelling responses to a question I asked in a calm way. Staff member cut me off numerous times as I attempted to answer her layered questions (which was more like an interrogation).

text.text: Relentlessly rude and snappy, yelling responses to a question I asked in a calm way. Staff member cut me off numerous times as I attempted to answer her layered questions (which was more like an interrogation).

originalText.text: Spoke to bursar office 12 times over the summer to receive electronic overpayment because papercheck was lost. Coordinated, filled out all paperwork.  Received assurances and they mailed paper check and it was lost AGAIN!

text.text: Spoke to bursar office 12 times over the summer to receive electronic overpayment because papercheck was lost. Coordinated, filled out all paperwork.  Received assurances and they mailed paper check and it was lost AGAIN!

originalText.text: I have never left reviews for anything in my life. I am a graduate student at NYU. The office of the bursar at NYU is the single worst organization I have ever had the displeasure of working with. They are truly awful. It makes me not want to attend the school at all. I wish I could give 0 stars.

text.text: I have never left reviews for anything in my life. I am a graduate student at NYU. The office of the bursar at NYU is the single worst organization I have ever had the displeasure of working with. They are truly awful. It makes me not want to attend the school at all. I wish I could give 0 stars.

originalText.text: As an alum I can honestly say: Absolutely terrible! They only add to the stresses of being a student at NYU and will be a source of constant stress for years to come unless you're able to pay off your loans all at once. Even if you want to give them your money, they are 50 years behind and will not allow you to send it through wire transfer or on their portal. You have to physically mail them a check or money order. Absolute buffoons working here and a moronically set up system. Terrible institution.

text.text: As an alum I can honestly say: Absolutely terrible! They only add to the stresses of being a student at NYU and will be a source of constant stress for years to come unless you're able to pay off your loans all at once. Absolute buffoons working here and a moronically set up system. Terrible institution.

originalText.text: Horrible. They won't even listen to you and just pass you onto the financial aid office if they hear the word "scholarship." Told me they didn't receive funds after I sent a large amount of money over to them and blamed me when it was really their fault. Awful. I had to call six or seven times to get my tuition paid this semester
